summary: Meduzot (the Hebrew word for Jellyfish) tells the story of three very different Israeli women living in Tel Aviv whose intersecting stories weave an unlikely portrait of modern Israeli life... See full summary »
cast: Sarah Adler|Nikol Leidman|Gera Sandler|Noa Raban|Ma. title: Meduzot
